products.name: Unlocked.Me
products.shortDescription: Perfect for busy students, through free digital banking, this account gives you quick and easy access to cash.
salesHighlights: ZERO fees on card swipes.
ZERO fees on cash deposits of up to R3 000 at Nedbank ATMs. (Thereafter pay-as-you-use fees will apply).
ZERO fees on internal debit and stop orders
ZERO fees for one external debit order (non-Nedbank).
ZERO data usage when banking with the Nedbank MoneyApp™.
ZERO annual fees on your cheque card.
ZERO fees for balance enquiries and inter-account transfers on the MoneyApp™ and all other self-service platforms
Ability to make online purchases with your card.
Free access to the www.unlocked.me experience and major discounts on the site.
Pay-as-you-use fees will apply on other transactions, see the pricing guide

products.name: Young Professional Bundle
products.shortDescription: Are you just setting out in your career? Get fast-tracked into Professional Banking at 50% of the monthly fee.
products.specialFeature: UNDER 30 WITH A MIN 4 YEAR DEGREE
salesHighlights: Relationship services for the entire family including a dedicated relationship banker, 24/7 call & email support and access to lending, invest and financial planning specialists
Unlimited swipes, debit orders and ATM withdrawals

Professional (Platinum Greenbacks) cheque card - contactless enabled. Dual issued with Amex and Visa Signature to ensure wide acceptance as well as to ensure the best lifestyle, travel and reward benefits possible
American Express® Platinum charge card at 50% discounted annual fee (for the first year only)
Overdraft facility available - additional fees apply
eNotes (SMS notifications)
No-funds alert (low balance notification)
Online banking subscription / Money™ App
Greenbacks rewards subscription
Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges via your Professional Cheque or Credit Card, when leaving SA
4 free visits to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges for kids on active Nedbank 4me or Unlocked.me Student accounts
10 International lounge visits via Professional Visa Signature Cheque or Credit Card. Emergency concierge services
Your household automatically qualifies to experience your relationship services
Get automatic travel insurance (for medical emergencies) when paying with your Professional Banking Credit Card
Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferential rates
100% loans for properties less than R1,5 million at tailored rates
100% loan for vehicle applications less than R400,000
Platinum investment products at exclusive rates. Direct access to Treasury for investments greater than R250,000
Free will drafting. Access to holistic estate & retirement planning

Free will drafting
Two free supplementary cards
Contactless-enabled cards (tap your card and pay)

products.name: Nedbank Gold Credit Card
products.shortDescription: Unlock convenience and flexibility with your Nedbank Gold Credit Card, accepted at over 25 million stores in South Africa and internationally. If you are seeking to be rewarded for your everyday spend, choose to add Greenbacks Rewards to your credit card or support a worthy cause through our Affinities Programme at no cost to you. Explore a world of shopping possibilities at over 25 million local and international merchants.

eligibilityRules.description: has an annual income of R60 000

salesHighlights: Fabulous travel discounts at nedbanktraveloffers.co.za.
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000.
Up to 55 days' interest-free credit.
No fees on point-of-sale purchases.
Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner.
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality.
For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months.
Optional Credit life cover to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment.
Option to join the Greenbacks Rewards Programme.
Option to join the Nedbank Affinity Programme.

Rewards: Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use.  Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks 2X faster with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card and there are no expiration dates, caps or tiers.

You will earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express® credit card - 2 Greenbacks for every R5 eligible spend and 1 Greenbacks for every R5 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

You get to decide how you spend your rewards! Choose to Shop Invest or Donate your rewards. You can also spend your Greenbacks like cash with a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card, withdraw your Greenbacks as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support the environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you

products.name: The American Express® Gold Card
products.shortDescription: Gold has never been this rewarding! Enjoy a complimentary monthly Lifestyle Rewards valued at more than your monthly Card fees. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando and Takealot.com or for airtime across networks. The rewards you want are there for the taking.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;

salesHighlights: The American Express® Gold Card is perfect for everyday shopping and with its budget facility it is perfect for larger than normal purchases.

Enjoy a complimentary Lifestyle Reward when you spend R3 500 or more per month on your American Express® Gold Card. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando, and Takealot.com or for Airtime across networks. To qualify for your monthly lifestyle benefit, keep your account in good standing (i.e. the account may not be in arrears or inactive) and spend at least R3 500 on your account per month your account ( cash withdrawals/transfers excluded). To redeem your benefits, visit Lifestyle Rewards (www.amexlifestyle.co.za) and enter your unique code.

Receive either a complimentary appetizer, 20% discount on food bills or a complimentary bottle of wine when paying your American Express Gold Card at participating restaurant. Click here for more info on Taste from American Express (link to: https://www.americanexpress.com/uk/network/dining/)
Exclusive Travel deals such as discounted flights and travel packages brought to you by American Express Travel.
American Express Vacations where you will receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Travel Insurance: Purchase your travel tickets on your Gold Card and you and your family will receive automatic local and international cover for up to R4 million.
Discounted car rental services and exclusive benefits at Avis and Hertz.
valueAddedServices: You can also pay your balance over time. You can choose how much to pay; just pay in full, the minimum amount due, or anything in between - it's that simple.
A dedicated travel desk to take care of all you travel needs.
Enjoy remarkable basic worldwide protection for you, your partner, your children and your Supplementary Cardmembers which includes up to R10 million cover.
Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
Being a Gold Cardmember entitles you to invitations to Amex Experiences events.
Your American Express® Gold Cardmember entitles you to complimentary Supplementary Cards.

As an American Express® Cardmember you w: Bonus MR Points- spend R10 000 within 3 months of opening your account and you will receive 5 000 bonus Membership Rewards points.
Enhanced Car Rental: Complimentary membership to Avis Preferred Plus where you will receive a free additional driver; guaranteed single vehicle upgrade at airport locations and a free weekend voucher

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates; o one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.

productFeatures.name: localairportlounge
productFeatures.description: Yes, Limited access to Bidvest Lounges (8 visits p.a)

productFeatures.name: travelservicesdesk
productFeatures.description: Limited access to the Travel Desk

productFeatures.name: carhirebenefits
productFeatures.description: Hertz Gold Plus, Avis Preferred Plus

products.name: The American Express® Platinum Card
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a host of unmatched travel and lifestyle benefits. Get exclusive airline benefits and access to over 1 000 Airport Lounges around the world.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;

salesHighlights: The American Express® Platinum Card is perfect for everyday shopping and with its budget facility it is perfect for larger than normal purchases.

Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando, and Takealot.com or for Airtime across networks. To qualify for your monthly lifestyle benefit, keep your account in good standing (i.e. the account may not be in arrears or inactive) and spend at least R3 500 on your account per month your account ( cash withdrawals/transfers excluded). valueAddedServices: You can also pay your balance over time. You can choose how much to pay; just pay in full, the minimum amount due, or anything in between - it's that simple.
Enjoy remarkable basic worldwide protection for you, your partner, your children and your Supplementary Cardmembers which includes up to R10 million cover.
Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
Being a Platinum Cardmember entitles you to invitations to customised or exclusive events.
Your American Express® Platinum Card entitles you to one complimentary Platinum Supplementary and four complimentary Gold Supplementary Cards!

Hotel Programmes- Platinum brings you ex: Fine Hotels and Resorts - get access to over 900 hand-selected, iconic five-star properties worldwide.
The Hotel Collection - enjoy credits at more than 400 hotels in over 30 countries, including Hilton, Intercontinental and Mariott Hotels.
The Vacation Collection - when you book two nights or more at most of our hotels, you can also receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Enjoy complimentary membership to the elite Preferred Golf programme, which boasts over 50 world-renowned golf resorts.
Enhanced Car Rental: Complimentary membership to Avis Preferred Plus where you will receive a free additional driver; guaranteed single vehicle upgrade at airport locations and a free weekend voucher.

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates;one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.
Airport Lounge Access: Complimentary access to over 1 000 airport lounges worldwide including:
What's more, you can each bring a guest at no cost into all American Express® and Priority Pass™ lounges when you travel.

productCategories.name: Borrow
productCategories.description: I need a loan to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: PersonalLoan
productLines.description: School fees, unexpected bills, a holiday, 2nd hand vehicle or home renovations? A personal loan can offer you the funds you need.

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R2 000 to R300 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 6 to 72 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection cover for death, disability and retrenchment. Nedbank Personal Loan Protection Insurance has been specially developed to help pay off your outstanding debt should you be unable to make your loan repayments in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment. Or you can take out an insurance policy of your choice provided it has all the necessary benefits. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.

productLines.name: CreditCards
productLines.description: Enjoy access to credit for daily and even larger purchases.

products.name: Nedbank Gold Credit Card (1032)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the freedom of purchasing the things you need now with the convenience of paying for them over time. Enjoy these and many other benefits with a Nedbank Credit Card.
salesHighlights: Up to 55 days' interest-free credit.
Enjoy zero transaction fees
Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000
For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months.
Optional Credit life cover to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment.
Option to join the Greenbacks Rewards Programme
Option to join the Nedbank Affinity Programme

Rewards: Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks, twice as fast with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card. Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. You get to choose how you spend your rewards! Clients enjoy the flexibility of having two cards linked to one account - the Greenbacks American Express®™ credit card and the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Clients earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express® credit card - 2 Greenbacks rewards for every R5 eligible spend and 1 Greenbacks for every R5 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Your rewards are automatically loaded onto a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card which you can use at over 100 000 leading stores nationwide, withdraw as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you
Green Affinity - Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you

products.name: The American Express® Gold Card (1027)
products.shortDescription: Gold has never been this rewarding! Enjoy a complimentary monthly Lifestyle Rewards valued at more than your monthly Card fees. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando and Takealot.com or for airtime across networks. The rewards you want are there for the taking.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;

salesHighlights: The American Express® Gold Card is perfect for everyday shopping and with its budget facility it is perfect for larger than normal purchases.

Enjoy a complimentary Lifestyle Reward when you spend R3 500 or more per month on your American Express® Gold Card. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando, and Takealot.com or for Airtime across networks. To qualify for your monthly lifestyle benefit, keep your account in good standing (i.e. the account may not be in arrears or inactive) and spend at least R3 500 on your account per month your account ( cash withdrawals/transfers excluded). To redeem your benefits, visit Lifestyle Rewards (www.amexlifestyle.co.za) and enter your unique code.

Receive either a complimentary appetizer, 20% discount on food bills or a complimentary bottle of wine when paying your American Express Gold Card at participating restaurant. Click here for more info on Taste from American Express (link to: https://www.americanexpress.com/uk/network/dining/)
Exclusive Travel deals such as discounted flights and travel packages brought to you by American Express Travel.
American Express Vacations where you will receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Travel Insurance: Purchase your travel tickets on your Gold Card and you and your family will receive automatic local and international cover for up to R4 million.
Discounted car rental services and exclusive benefits at Avis and Hertz.
valueAddedServices: You can also pay your balance over time. You can choose how much to pay; just pay in full, the minimum amount due, or anything in between - it's that simple.
A dedicated travel desk to take care of all you travel needs.
Enjoy remarkable basic worldwide protection for you, your partner, your children and your Supplementary Cardmembers which includes up to R10 million cover.
Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
Being a Gold Cardmember entitles you to invitations to Amex Experiences events.
Your American Express® Gold Cardmember entitles you to complimentary Supplementary Cards.

As an American Express® Cardmember you w: Bonus MR Points- spend R10 000 within 3 months of opening your account and you will receive 5 000 bonus Membership Rewards points.

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates; o one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.
